title: Looking for OOL team
body:
I'm looking for an OOL team that is serious/semi-serious.
I'm currently bronze but that is only because I don't play ranked much.
I play with mostly high level Plat players.
Last season I got to silver 1 from bronze 4 in a short amount of time but then stopped playing ranked.
My main role is ADC but I am also pretty efficient at Jungle and Support.
Add me on LoL if you are interested :)

IGN : Maddogtom9

replies.body: Are you going to have trials for your team firstly? Like in normals?
Try us ask me if u want to join on my lol account ill give u details

IGN:The Gingninj69
Mains: Mid, Sup, ADC
I would love to join ya with the ool team, have skype and teamspeak.
